item.title: Mercury soars in Raichur: Five places cross 39 degrees, Gurgunta hottest at 40.4
item.description:
<![CDATA[Mangaluru: Raichur district experienced a sharp rise in temperatures over the last 24 hours, with five places recording more than 39 degrees and two crossing the 40-degree mark. Gurgunta Hobli recorded the highest temperature in the state at 40.4 degrees, according to the Karnataka State Natural Disaster Monitoring Centre (KSNDMC).
